name: Paper Skate
description:
Paper Skate is the most exciting skateboarding game on the app store.
if you like tiny wings you will love this cool physics based game.
Get on your skate and go as fast as you can!
Jump to perform amazing tricks.
How to Play:
- Tap and hold to push the skater down
My Awesome Features:
- Amazing 3D graphics
- Beautiful skate world
- Realistic physics
